column5: we are leaving for lake nippising on friday. Can anyone give me any up to date reports on walleye, perch , smallmouth, or northern. And any fishing tips, would be greatly appriciated.Thnxdctolle

Was up there two weekends ago. Rained like crazy. Pike were biting on just about anything. Walleyes were sparse but I hear they've turned on. Check out the Ontariofishing.net message board and look for the Nipissing Report with Pictures. There's the proof.
